targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND request_uri LIKE '%gov%'
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
  AND business_domain LIKE '%auth%'
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
  AND business_domain LIKE '%payment%'
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
  AND business_domain LIKE '%file%'
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT 
  toStartOfInterval(log_time, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) as time,
  business_domain,
  avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND business_domain IN (
    'user-auth-general', 'payment-service', 'file-storage-general', 
    'government-service', 'gateway-proxy'
  )
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time, business_domain 
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  toStartOfInterval(log_time, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) as time,
  business_domain,
  countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/count() as error_rate
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND business_domain IN (
    'user-auth-general', 'payment-service', 'file-storage-general', 
    'government-service', 'gateway-proxy'
  )
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time, business_domain 
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN request_uri LIKE '%gov%' THEN concat(platform, '-Gov')
    WHEN os_type = 'HarmonyOS' THEN 'HarmonyOS'
    WHEN device_type = 'smartphone' THEN concat(platform, '-Phone')
    WHEN device_type = 'tablet' THEN concat(platform, '-Tablet')
    WHEN device_type = 'desktop' THEN 'Desktop'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END as platform_detail,
  count(*) as requests
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY platform_detail 
ORDER BY requests DESC 
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN referer_url LIKE '%.gov.%' THEN 'High Trust'
    WHEN referer_url LIKE '%baidu%' OR referer_url LIKE '%google%' THEN 'Medium Trust'
    WHEN referer_url = '' THEN 'Direct Access'
    ELSE 'Low Trust'
  END as trust_level,
  count(*) as requests,
  toFloat64(countIf(response_status_code = '200')*100.0/count(*)) as avg_quality
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY trust_level
ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT 
  concat(business_criticality, '-', 
    CASE 
      WHEN length(request_uri) > 100 OR query_params_count > 10 THEN 'Complex'
      WHEN length(request_uri) > 50 OR query_params_count > 3 THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Simple'
    END
  ) as priority_complexity,
  count(*) as requests,
  avg(business_value_score) as avg_importance
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND business_criticality != 'standard'
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY priority_complexity 
ORDER BY requests DESC 
LIMIT 8

SELECT 
  toStartOfInterval(log_time, INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) as time,
  concat(business_domain, ' (', business_criticality, ')') as api_business,
  avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND business_criticality IN ('critical', 'high')
  AND business_domain NOT IN ('unknown', 'general-service')
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY time, api_business 
ORDER BY time, api_business

SELECT 
  business_domain as "‰∏öÂä°Âüü",
  count(*) as "ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊÄªÊï∞",
  round(avg(total_request_duration), 0) as "Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥ms",
  round(countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/count(), 2) as "ÈîôËØØÁéá%",
  business_criticality as "‰∏öÂä°‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß",
  CASE 
    WHEN avg(total_request_duration) > 3000 OR countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/count() > 5 THEN '‰∏•Èáç'
    WHEN avg(total_request_duration) > 1000 OR countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/count() > 2 THEN 'Ë≠¶Âëä'
    ELSE 'Ê≠£Â∏∏'
  END as "ÈóÆÈ¢òÁ∫ßÂà´"
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) 
  AND business_domain NOT IN ('unknown', 'general-service')
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
  AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
  AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
  AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
  AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
GROUP BY business_domain, business_criticality 
ORDER BY count(*) DESC 
LIMIT 10
